desc.p: This is a file that contains entries for the ids in the TRANSACTION.CHARGE file. The key to this file can be the transaction charge id sequence number optionally concatenated with a '.' to the general charge key.
If there is a transaction charge record with the following ids :-
This will result in two record in this file with the following ids :-
101 (Id without a general charge id corresponding to 101.19950901) 101.1 (Id with a general charge id corresponding to 101.19950331.1 & 101.19950601.1)
This field will contain all the effective dates for a particular transaction charge.
